title: thillaanaa
sahitya:
udana tatana tara dhIm tana dhirana tillillAnA drudru tOm tanOm tanOm
 tanOm
 
anupallavi

  naadirudiru tOm diru diru jum cananana tana dhIm


ciTTai swaram 1

 R S n S d p m p m m m g , m r s
 (udana)

caraNam

 mahimakEku mahishUra mahipati mahArAja pUjita dhanapati
 mahanIya guNa nAlvaDi shrI krSNa mahArAjEndruni brOvu mAtangi

ciTTai swaram 2

 p p m p d m p d p m p g , m r s
 r g m r , s d , p m p g , m r s
 
  dhirana tarana tOm tatara tillillAna kiTkiTatOm tillillAna kiTatOm
 tillillAna kiTkiT tOm
 (udana)
